mapper.select: WITH BUYERVIEW AS( SELECT BUYER.*, LPROD_NM FROM BUYER INNER JOIN LPROD ON (BUYER_LGU = LPROD_GU) WHERE BUYER_ID = #{buyer_id} ) SELECT BUYERVIEW.* , PROD_NAME, PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE, PROD_SALE, PROD_OUTLINE, PROD_MILEAGE FROM BUYERVIEW LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD ON (BUYER_ID = PROD_BUYER)
